widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 0), size = (60, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 0), size = (120, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (240, 0), size = (200, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 4), size = (90, 40), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 0), size = (60, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 0), size = (120, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (240, 0), size = (200, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 4), size = (90, 40), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28), gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 40 }

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 120, textsize[1] + 120) count = len(self.list) if count > 15: count = 15 offset = 38 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 15
if (960 > wsizex): wsizex = 960 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 38 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex)/2, (1080-wsizey)/(count > 11 and 2 or 3)))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 11), size = (360, 28), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 6), size = (45, 30), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 11), size = (360, 28), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 6), size = (45, 30), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 50 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 90, textsize[1] + 90) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 120 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxConfirmCode
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 90, textsize[1] + 90) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 120 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - newheight)/2))

screen.name: ManualFancontrol
screen.title: Fancontrol Settings in Idle Server Mode

screen.name: MessageBoxConfirm
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 90, textsize[1] + 90) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 120 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 100) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
